name: Spirits of Viðr
description:
Unravel the dark truths and the hidden spirits of the Viðr in this new otherworldly roguelike dungeon-crawler! In Spirits of Viðr, you play as Embla, a young girl lost in the sunken woods who’s been forced to fight to survive. 

Using the powers of the spirits and Embla’s innate ability, shift between different planes of reality and fight your way through the corrupted forest. 

NOTE: This game is recommended to be played with a controller.
